content.description: Start in the cave on the jug with an undercling then go out right to the bottom of the huge flake and then climb up the huge flake and top out above.
content.location: This is on a boulder near Nemesis. Walk to the right of Nemesis and look up towards General Patton's, you should see a boulder up there just below the huge boulder General Patton's is on. This climb starts in the small cave on the right side of this boulder.

content.description: Same start as the Cave Flake problem but instead of going left to the flake, climb straight up into the face and then make a really cool move where you stand up tall and hit the top of the flake.
content.location: read Cave Flake page for location, its near General Patton's arrete

pathTokens: Boulders Behind the Main Parking Lot/Visitor Center

content.description: 10' high boulder littered with easy problems above bad landings.
